name: Tagline Machine
tag_list: branding, marketing, copywriting, slogans, naming, titles, advertising
overview:
The Tagline Machine creates taglines, slogans, titles and names for small businesses and startups or products that are shaping their brands.

The company is a fast-turnaround branding resource that’s driven by a “four second” philosophy of customer connection. Entrepreneurs can navigate the easy-to-use website and and purchase taglines, by the line suggestion, after submitting a creative brief. The creative process is text driven. No meetings or conference calls.

The company is led by Simon Gornick, a long time Hollywood Copywriter who’s worked with many of the top entertainment marketing agencies on the West Coast.
